name: pi-voice
description: Voice interface for pi coding agent
author: Yuku Kotani

scripts.build: bun run build:main && bun run build:cli
scripts.build:main: bun build src/main.ts --outdir out/main --target node --format esm --external node-web-audio-api --external uiohook-napi --external @mariozechner/pi-coding-agent --external @google/genai
scripts.build:cli: bun build src/cli.ts --outdir out/cli --target node --format esm
